subdisciplines.name: Auteur Theory
subdisciplines.description: A film theory that emphasizes the director as the primary creative voice behind a film.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist Film Theory
subdisciplines.description: A film theory that examines the representation of women and gender in film, and criticizes the patriarchal nature of mainstream cinema.

subdisciplines.name: Genre Theory
subdisciplines.description: A film theory that focuses on the categorization of films into genres and how those genres shape audience expectations and meanings.

subdisciplines.name: Narrative Theory
subdisciplines.description: A film theory that examines the structure and content of film narratives and how they convey meaning.

subdisciplines.name: Structuralism
subdisciplines.description: A film theory that emphasizes the underlying structures and systems that shape a film's meaning, rather than its individual components.
